title: Gadget Trial
description: Gadget Trial (??????????, Gajetto Toraiaru?) is a Japanese PC game that combines visual novel elements with turn-based strategy gaming. It was developed by KOGADO Studio&#039;s Kumasan Team, and was released in Japan in June 23, 2006. The game is commercially distributed for 8800 yen. It&#039;s original language is Japanese, and there are no official translations; however, an unofficial, fan-made English translation patch is available both for the demo and the full version.
